description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get Off My Island is a single player physics based action game. Help "GOMI The Monkey" keep tourists out of GOMI Island. Use a slingshot to toss fruit at tourists & destroy their buildings. Includes 63 original boards. Physics-based demolition gameplay. Fun characters with unique personalities. Multiple fruits, each with unique abilities - shooting, bombing & heavy duty destruction.
description.short: Get Off My Island is a single player physics based action game. Help "GOMI The Monkey" keep tourists out of GOMI Island. Use a slingshot to toss fruit at tourists & destroy their buildings. Includes 63 original boards. Physics-based demolition gameplay. Fun characters with unique personalities. Multiple fruits, each with unique abilities - shooting, bombing & heavy duty destruction.
